        Register a listener for all events that represent a member has left the group.
        Specified by:
        registerMemberLeavingListener in interface GMSAdapter
        Parameters:
        callback - Signal can be either PlannedShutdownSignal, FailureNotificationSignal or JoinNotificationSignal(subevent Rejoin).

      • registerFailureRecoveryListener

        public void registerFailureRecoveryListener(String componentName,
                                            com.sun.enterprise.ee.cms.core.CallBack callback)
        Registers a FailureRecovery Listener.
        Specified by:
        registerFailureRecoveryListener in interface GMSAdapter
        Parameters:
        callback - processes GMS notification FailureRecoverySignal
        componentName - The name of the parent application's component that should be notified of selected for performing recovery operations. One or more components in the parent application may want to be notified of such selection for their respective recovery operations.

      • registerMessageListener

        public void registerMessageListener(String componentName,
                                    com.sun.enterprise.ee.cms.core.CallBack messageListener)
        Registers a Message Listener.
        Specified by:
        registerMessageListener in interface GMSAdapter
        Parameters:
        componentName - Name of the component that would like to consume Messages. One or more components in the parent application would want to be notified when messages arrive addressed to them. This registration allows GMS to deliver messages to specific components.
        messageListener - processes GMS MessageSignal

      • registerGroupLeadershipNotificationListener

        public void registerGroupLeadershipNotificationListener(com.sun.enterprise.ee.cms.core.CallBack callback)
        Registers a GroupLeadershipNotification Listener.
        Specified by:
        registerGroupLeadershipNotificationListener in interface GMSAdapter
        Parameters:
        callback - processes GMS notification GroupLeadershipNotificationSignal. This event occurs when the GMS masters leaves the Group and another member of the group takes over leadership. The signal indicates the new leader.

      • removeMemberLeavingListener

        public void removeMemberLeavingListener(com.sun.enterprise.ee.cms.core.CallBack callback)
        Description copied from interface: GMSAdapter
        Remove previously registered Listeners related to Leaving a Group. Thus, listeners for PlannedShutdown, FailureNotification and Add - Rejoin Subevent are to be removed.
        Specified by:
        removeMemberLeavingListener in interface GMSAdapter
        Parameters:
        callback - to be removed
